channel.title: Donator [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey i just downloaded a source and i need to get donator for checking out all the places and shops,, So??
How do i make my self donator?
In the Pker.txt it is two diffrent lines that says character-donator = 0

item.title: Donator [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“own-u, post:12, topic:317728”][quote author=pkerA link=topic=414242.msg3050628#msg3050628 date=1260059203]

I have the same issue. I go into characters, and find mine. I then change it to donator = 1 and save. However when I log in im not a donator, and when I check back in the .text file, its back to = 0. Im also editing and saving when Im offline. this is really annoying, someone help…

Is it possible to get rep++

I have found out!
I can help!

Here are the easy steps…

  1. In the source folder it is a folder named config open it
  2. In the folde it is some text files
  3. Open the Donator.txt
  4. Write ur name and save
  5. Compile and Congratzz ur a donator
    [/quote]

FFS thank you![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Donator [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you need to make sure your logged out when you change and save the file, log back in when you are finished saving and changing the file.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

if its a character matter for 508… you don’t need to compile. if it’s a server matter only you compile

Read full topic

item.title: Donator [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @mykittypwns mykittypwns
item.description:
@mykittypwns wrote:

if its 508 u must use wordpad then change it to donator=1 and hit save then close it you will become whatever you need

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

tinyscape:

if it’s a 508 then compile it after u change. then restart your server

he has a text file so it’s probably a 317 …
he just need to edit it to donator=1
then no compiling just don be logged in on that account b4 u change it!!

I check the txt and then it is changed to 0 again!
